byline.contributor: Diaa Hadid contributed reporting from Ramallah, West Bank.

abstract: Palestinian leaders hand over files at International Criminal Court in The Hague documenting what they claim are Israeli war crimes; largely symbolic move marks another advance in Palestinian drive to gain statehood and hold Israel accountable for occupation of lands claimed by Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: Palestinian leaders delivered files documenting what they say are Israeli war crimes at the International Criminal Court in The Hague.

headline.main: Palestinians Deliver Accusations of Israeli War Crimes to Hague Court
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Deliver Accusations of Israeli War Crimes to International Criminal Court

snippet: Palestinian leaders delivered files documenting what they say are Israeli war crimes at the International Criminal Court in The Hague.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
